text: Katha Dilam is a 1991 Bengali movie directed by Rajat Das and produced by N. S. S. Film Concern. Prosenjit Chatterjee and Ayesha Jhulka are the main actors for the movie. The music for the movie was composed by Ajoy Das. == Cast == * Prosenjit Chatterjee as Sanjay * Ayesha Jhulka as Anita Chatterjee * Shakuntala Barua as Mrs. Sunita Chatterjee * Sukhen Das as Ranga * Sumitra Mukherjee as Sanjay's Mother * Soumitra Banerjee as Jibon Dutt * N. Vishwanathan as Satya Sen == Songs == * "Katha Dilam" â€“ Asha Bhosle * "Premke Aami Bhalobashi" - Amit Kumar * "I Am Romeo" - Amit Kumar, Kavita Krishnamurthy * "Maake Je Bhoy Kore" - Kavita Krishnamurthy == References ==
title: Katha Dilam
